section.name: DRLVM Source Code Generated Documentation Index
section.p: This is a landing page for Doxygen source code reference generated automatically from interface headers. Each link should lead to a documentation bundle generated from a component-related set of header files. The purpose of these documents is to provide a complete reference of available code in DRLVM interfaces. Because the code base is being actively developed, not all interfaces are well-documented at this point, so that you can find some interfaces not documented. Everyone's welcome to contribute to this initiative.
The documentation bundles were generated automatically and posted on the site server. You can regenerate the docs from your source files locally, as described in section Regenerating the Reference.

section.name: Regenerating the Reference
section.p: Follow these instructions to regenerate reference materials analogous to those posted on the website. You can also adjust the list of files to include into a specific documentation bundle and configure Doxygen to produce a different output, see section Advanced Tasks

subsection.name: Advanced Tasks
subsection.p: Generation of Doxygen reference is adjusted by the following files located in trunk/vm/doc:

ul.li: doc.properties defines the input and output directories and the files included in each bundle
build.xml lists all doc build targets
vm.cfg is a copy of classlib configuration files and defines formatting and other output properties for Doxygen
